== San Francisco Trusty Release Party ==

* Date: Thursday April, 24, 2014
* Time: 6-9PM
* Location: <nowiki>[[http://www.adroll.com/|AdRoll]]</nowiki>, 972 Mission St
* Event page and RSVP: http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/ubuntu-california/2761-san-francisco-trusty-release-party/
* Mailing list thread organization: https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-us-ca/2014-March/002398.html

Plans:

# Mini presentation highlighting Ubuntu 14.04 features
# Bring laptops running 14.04 (anyone who is able)
# Bring tablets or phones running the latest Ubuntu build (anyone who is able)
# Ubuntu quiz that people can fill out and submit, with prizes!
